attributes.action: Make insulin pumps available to all Type 1 diabetics
attributes.additional_details: Insulin pumps should be made available to any type 1 diabetic who wishes to use one - not just those who have poor control or low hypoglycaemic awareness. The improvement to quality of life and freedom from mutliple daily injections is invaluable - the UK has one of the lowest rates of type 1's on pumps in the developed world and this is not acceptable.
